reuters.title: SERVICE RESOURCES <SRC> UNIT IN ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Chas. P. Young Co, a subsidiary of Service Resources Corp, said it signed a definitive agreement to acquire Atwell Fleming Printing Ltd, of Canada, for about 3.2 mln dlrs. The transaction is expected to close in April. ON February 23, Chas. P. Young said it had aquired 19.05 pct of the shares of Sorg INc <SRG> to facilitate a newgotiated business combination. Reuter 
